void demo::initHashTables ( void   )  [static]

Initialise has tables.

Initialises the hash tables that map Tcl command name arguments to the addresses of pointing kernel objects.

void demo::registerAxis ( const Axis *  axis,
const char *  name 
) [static]

Register axis with a cable wrap.

Axes registered as wrap axes can be switch to the other cable wrap with the Tcl unwrap command.

Parameters:
axis  axis
name  name in hash table

void demo::registerGuider ( const guider *  guider_info,
const char *  name 
) [static]

Register guider.

The guider virtual telescope associated with the guider is registered in the table of virtual telescopes, and offset is created and registered for the guider and the guider_info structure registered in the table of guiders.

Parameters:
guider_info  guider info structure
name  name in hash tables

void demo::registerMount ( const tpk::MountVt *  mount,
const char *  name 
) [static]

Register a mount virtual telescope.

The virtual telescope is registered in the tables if mounts and virtual telescopes and an offset for the mount created and registered.

Parameters:
mount  mount
name  name in hash tables

) [static]

Register optics virtual telescope.
